SELECT A.id, user_id, subject, message, image_name, digest, keyword, top, rate, rate_times, views, A.status, A.allow_comment, A.created_date, A.last_modified_date, A.deleted, U.username as user_username, C.id as cat_id, C.category_name as cat_category_name, C.description as cat_description, C.allow_comment as cat_allow_comment FROM cms_article AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_user AS U ON user_id = U.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_category AS C ON category_id = C.id WHERE A.id=#{id}

SELECT A.id, user_id, subject, message, image_name, digest, keyword, top, rate, rate_times, views, A.status, A.allow_comment, A.created_date, A.last_modified_date, A.deleted, U.username as user_username, C.id as cat_id, C.category_name as cat_category_name, C.description as cat_description, C.allow_comment as cat_allow_comment FROM cms_article AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_user AS U ON user_id = U.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_category AS C ON category_id = C.id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT id, user_id, category_id, subject, rate, rate_times, views, top, STATUS , deleted, created_date, last_modified_date FROM cms_article WHERE deleted =0 AND YEAR( created_date ) = YEAR( #{created_date} ) AND MONTH( created_date ) = MONTH( #{created_date} )
